page.title: 11A STREET IN DOGSTHORPE
page.content: Dovecote Close is a small winding close off a main road called Welland Road. There are no shops in the street, although a short distance away can be found a supermarket. In the close there are three kinds of house: detached,semi-detached and terraced. The majority of the houses are semi-detached and they have been built to two basic designs. One of the designs has no entrance hall and has the stairs to the bedrooms in the main living room. The second design enables you to enter the house through a door that leads into the kitchen. These houses also have a main living room on the ground floor. Both designs of house have a similar second floor, each having a bathroom with toilet and three bedrooms.
